item.title: RINEX Reader
item.description: Github Repo This was my first major project with python, most of this post will be taken from the assignment submission. The project was part of my GPS course in Undergrad, the project involved creating a python program to get an epoch by epoch least squares position solution of a GPS receiver using it’s observation and navigation RINEX files. This project was done with in part with Patrick Lasagne.
